subject: [Mhln] OEM Windows: XP uninstall on 1st computer; Install on 2nd ...
body:
Everyone complains of the badness of his memory, but nobody of his judgment.

Christianity is either relevant all the time or useless anytime. It is not just a phase of life it is life itself.

If you don't know where you are going, you might wind up someplace else.

No woman has ever so comforted the distressed or distressed the comfortable. [On Eleanor Roosevelt]

A god who let us prove his existence would be an idol.

The sharp thorn often produces delicate roses.

The heart is forever inexperienced.

Man will do many things to get himself loved he will do all things to get himself envied.

A sign of celebrity is often that their name is worth more than their services.

Justice is my being allowed to do whatever I like. Injustice is whatever prevents my doing so.

Is life worth living? This is a question for an embryo not for a man.


A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.

Existence really is an imperfect tense that never becomes a present.
